name: Deweese Edward
occupation: Petroleum engineer and a trade expert
description:
I am a very honest man who would like to meet that special someone to share life’s adventures
with. I’m searching for a caring, honest, understanding and fun to be with person. Love an
intelligent conversation. I have a great sense of humor and a great personality. I am also very
romantic, sensual and passionate. I have many interests including long romantic walks, holding hands and sneaking in a kiss or two – anywhere from the park to the beach, I love cooking together and enjoying a candle lit dinner, I enjoy watching sports either on TV or at a stadium. Other interests are dancing, bowling, camping, fishing, boating, and many more. I enjoy cuddling while watching a movie or just having a drink and talking about whatever comes to mind. There is more to me lets chat here
